36 /* Author: Michael Ferguson, Ioan Sucan, E. Gil Jones */

38 #include <moveit_simple_controller_manager/follow_joint_trajectory_controller_handle.h>
39 #include <moveit/utils/xmlrpc_casts.h>
40 
41 using namespace moveit::core;
42 static const std::string LOGNAME("SimpleControllerManager");
43 
44 namespace moveit_simple_controller_manager
45 {
46 bool FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::sendTrajectory(const moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory& trajectory)
47 {
48  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "new trajectory to " << name_);
49 
50  if (!controller_action_client_)
51  return false;
52 
53  if (!trajectory.multi_dof_joint_trajectory.points.empty())
54  {
55  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "%s cannot execute multi-dof trajectories.", name_.c_str());
56  }
57 
58  if (done_)
59  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "sending trajectory to " << name_);
60  else
61  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "sending continuation for the currently executed trajectory to " << name_);
62 
63  control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryGoal goal = goal_template_;
64  goal.trajectory = trajectory.joint_trajectory;
65  controller_action_client_->sendGoal(
66  goal, boost::bind(&FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::controllerDoneCallback, this, _1, _2),
67  boost::bind(&FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::controllerActiveCallback, this),
68  boost::bind(&FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::controllerFeedbackCallback, this, _1));
69  done_ = false;
70  last_exec_ = moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::RUNNING;
71  return true;
72 }
73 
74 void FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::configure(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& config)
75 {
76  if (config.hasMember("path_tolerance"))
77  configure(config["path_tolerance"], "path_tolerance", goal_template_.path_tolerance);
78  if (config.hasMember("goal_tolerance"))
79  configure(config["goal_tolerance"], "goal_tolerance", goal_template_.goal_tolerance);
80  if (config.hasMember("goal_time_tolerance"))
81  goal_template_.goal_time_tolerance = ros::Duration(parseDouble(config["goal_time_tolerance"]));
82 }
83 
84 namespace
85 {
86 enum ToleranceVariables
87 {
88  POSITION,
89  VELOCITY,
90  ACCELERATION
91 };
92 template <ToleranceVariables>
93 double& variable(control_msgs::JointTolerance& msg);
94 
95 template <>
96 inline double& variable<POSITION>(control_msgs::JointTolerance& msg)
97 {
98  return msg.position;
99 }
100 template <>
101 inline double& variable<VELOCITY>(control_msgs::JointTolerance& msg)
102 {
103  return msg.velocity;
104 }
105 template <>
106 inline double& variable<ACCELERATION>(control_msgs::JointTolerance& msg)
107 {
108  return msg.acceleration;
109 }
110 
111 static std::map<ToleranceVariables, std::string> VAR_NAME = { { POSITION, "position" },
112  { VELOCITY, "velocity" },
113  { ACCELERATION, "acceleration" } };
114 static std::map<ToleranceVariables, decltype(&variable<POSITION>)> VAR_ACCESS = { { POSITION, &variable<POSITION> },
115  { VELOCITY, &variable<VELOCITY> },
116  { ACCELERATION,
117  &variable<ACCELERATION> } };
118 
119 const char* errorCodeToMessage(int error_code)
120 {
121  switch (error_code)
122  {
123  case control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::SUCCESSFUL:
124  return "SUCCESSFUL";
125  case control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::INVALID_GOAL:
126  return "INVALID_GOAL";
127  case control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::INVALID_JOINTS:
128  return "INVALID_JOINTS";
129  case control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::OLD_HEADER_TIMESTAMP:
130  return "OLD_HEADER_TIMESTAMP";
131  case control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::PATH_TOLERANCE_VIOLATED:
132  return "PATH_TOLERANCE_VIOLATED";
133  case control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::GOAL_TOLERANCE_VIOLATED:
134  return "GOAL_TOLERANCE_VIOLATED";
135  default:
136  return "unknown error";
137  }
138 }
139 } // namespace
140 
141 void FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::configure(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& config, const std::string& config_name,
142  std::vector<control_msgs::JointTolerance>& tolerances)
143 {
144  if (isStruct(config)) // config should be either a struct of position, velocity, acceleration
145  {
146  for (ToleranceVariables var : { POSITION, VELOCITY, ACCELERATION })
147  {
148  if (!config.hasMember(VAR_NAME[var]))
149  continue;
150  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue values = config[VAR_NAME[var]];
151  if (isArray(values, joints_.size()))
152  {
153  size_t i = 0;
154  for (const auto& joint_name : joints_)
155  VAR_ACCESS[var](getTolerance(tolerances, joint_name)) = parseDouble(values[i++]);
156  }
157  else
158  { // use common value for all joints
159  double value = parseDouble(values);
160  for (const auto& joint_name : joints_)
161  VAR_ACCESS[var](getTolerance(tolerances, joint_name)) = value;
162  }
163  }
164  }
165  else if (isArray(config)) // or an array of JointTolerance msgs
166  {
167  for (int i = 0; i < config.size(); ++i) // NOLINT(modernize-loop-convert)
168  {
169  control_msgs::JointTolerance& tol = getTolerance(tolerances, config[i]["name"]);
170  for (ToleranceVariables var : { POSITION, VELOCITY, ACCELERATION })
171  {
172  if (!config[i].hasMember(VAR_NAME[var]))
173  continue;
174  VAR_ACCESS[var](tol) = parseDouble(config[i][VAR_NAME[var]]);
175  }
176  }
177  }
178  else
179  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Invalid " << config_name);
180 }
181 
182 control_msgs::JointTolerance&
183 FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::getTolerance(std::vector<control_msgs::JointTolerance>& tolerances,
184  const std::string& name)
185 {
186  auto it =
187  std::lower_bound(tolerances.begin(), tolerances.end(), name,
188  [](const control_msgs::JointTolerance& lhs, const std::string& rhs) { return lhs.name < rhs; });
189  if (it == tolerances.cend() || it->name != name)
190  { // insert new entry if not yet available
191  it = tolerances.insert(it, control_msgs::JointTolerance());
192  it->name = name;
193  }
194  return *it;
195 }
196 
197 void FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::controllerDoneCallback(
198  const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& state, const control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResultConstPtr& result)
199 {
200  // Output custom error message for FollowJointTrajectoryResult if necessary
201  if (!result)
202  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Controller '" << name_ << "' done, no result returned");
203  else if (result->error_code == control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryResult::SUCCESSFUL)
204  ROS_INFO_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Controller '" << name_ << "' successfully finished");
205  else
206  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Controller '" << name_ << "' failed with error "
207  << errorCodeToMessage(result->error_code) << ": "
208  << result->error_string);
209  finishControllerExecution(state);
210 }
211 
212 void FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::controllerActiveCallback()
213 {
214  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, name_ << " started execution");
215 }
216 
217 void FollowJointTrajectoryControllerHandle::controllerFeedbackCallback(
218  const control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryFeedbackConstPtr& /* feedback */)
219 {
220 }
